GSD.product_version: versions from v4.0 to before v5.4.204
GSD.description:
PM / devfreq: exynos-ppmu: Fix refcount leak in of_get_devfreq_events

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.204 by commit bdecd912e99acfd61507f1720d3f4eed1b3418d8, it was introduced in version v4.0 by commit f262f28c147051e7aa6daaf4fb5996833ffadff4. For more details please see the references link.
